title: The Playbirds
description: When a serial killer starts stalking the sultry models who've graced the pages of a British gentleman's magazine, beautiful Scotland Yard WPC Lucy Sheridan (Mary Millington) loses the uniform... and goes undercover to convince the publisher (Alan Lake) she should be next month's centerfold. Will she succeed in trapping the fiend... or be caught with her knickers down? Steamy thriller co-stars Suzy Mandel, Glynn Edwards, Winsor Davies, Penny Spencer. 89 min. Widescreen; Soundtrack: English. Region Free
